message: Hey Bob, I've got a great product for you that I think you'll be very interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $125.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $110.  This is a great deal for a product worth much more. Let's close this deal!
